code: var styles={skill:{textAlign:'center',width:'10em',height:'10em',border:'2px solid rgba(110, 212, 111,255)',borderRadius:'5px',margin:'3%',paddingTop:'1em',transition:'all .5s'},skillMouseOver:{textAlign:'center',width:'10em',height:'10em',border:'3px solid rgba(110, 212, 111,255)',borderRadius:'5px',margin:'3%',paddingTop:'1em',boxShadow:'5px 5px 10px rgba(60, 162, 61,100)',transition:'all .5s'},skillLogo:{height:'5em',width:'5em',marginLeft:'auto',marginRight:'auto',backgroundSize:'cover',backgroundPosition:'center',marginBottom:'1em'},level:{width:'90%',height:'1em',border:'1px solid rgba(110, 212, 111,255)',marginLeft:'auto',marginRight:'auto'}};export default styles;
